description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The 1974 world cup matches in football held in the Federal Republic; the European Parliament founded 15 years ago and a speech by Willy Brandt urging the countries of Europe to make union a reality; Europe's largest car factory and its guest worker population; the problem of disposing radioactive atomic waste and one solution used in the United States and Federal Republic; Berlin's Jazz Week with a presentation of various jazz styles from the past up to now.
